Hong Song Nam meets Chinese ambassador 
    Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, met and conversed with Chinese ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang  who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
